column2: "Hi, hello! You know her, you love her, it's Patty!"
"Hello, it's Tea."
"Um, Matoi here!"
"No, no, no, no, all wrong! You've ruined our production! You can't just jump in by yourself!"
"...Oh? Did I do something wrong?"
"Not just something. You did just about everything wrong..."
"I've seen you two doing this a few times. It looked like fun. I just wanted to try it..."
"Well, why didn't you say so?! Never look a gift horse in the mouth, that's Patty n' Tea's motto!"

"That's the first I've heard of it...
So, shall we try mixing it up, just this once?"

"Alright, here's the latest, freshest information, brought to you by us THREE! Your attention, please!
...Uh, what are we talking about, again?"
"About the distant areas of planet Harkotan."
"Distant areas?"
"You're talking about Kuron Castle, aren't you? The largest building in the land of Kuron."
"What?"
"...Darker corruption has been seen in Kuron, so the Miko has given ARKS special permission to investigate."
"I see."
"Sukuna-hime said she can't deal with another Magatsu-type incident by herself, so she's asked ARKS to lend her our power."
"Wait, are you saying you've talked to her yourself?"
"That's what an information dealer does, isn't it? Sukuna-hime is our friend. She's told me all sorts of things."
"Sukuna-hime? Magatsu? Hey, Tea, what's she talking about?"
"She remembers what she's heard. She's proactive about gathering information. And most importantly, she isn't loud and annoying..."
"...Matoi, why don't you and I start our own information business?"
"Tea?!"
